scripts.deploy-check: standard --fix && npm test | tee tests.txt && npm run generate
scripts.generate: NODE_ENV=testing EXIT_ON_START=true GENERATE_SITEMAP_TXT=true GENERATE_API_TXT=true GENERATE_ENV_TXT=true node main.js
scripts.test-sqlite-node-cache: NODE_ENV=testing CACHE=node STORAGE=sqlite SQLITE_DATABASE=connect SQLITE_FILE=`pwd`/db.sqlite mocha --ignore 'node_modules/**/*' --timeout 480000 --recursive --extension .test.js .
scripts.test-sqlite-redis-cache: NODE_ENV=testing CACHE=redis STORAGE=sqlite SQLITE_DATABASE=connect SQLITE_FILE=`pwd`/db.sqlite mocha --ignore 'node_modules/**/*' --timeout 480000 --recursive --extension .test.js .
scripts.test-mariadb: NODE_ENV=testing LOG_LEVEL=error STORAGE=mariadb MARIADB_HOST=localhost MARIADB_PORT=3306 MARIADB_PASSWORD=password MARIADB_DATABASE=testdb MARIADB_USERNAME=user mocha --ignore 'node_modules/**/*' --timeout 480000 --recursive --extension .test.js .
scripts.test-mariadb-node-cache: NODE_ENV=testing CACHE=node STORAGE=mariadb MARIADB_HOST=localhost MARIADB_PORT=3306 MARIADB_PASSWORD=password MARIADB_DATABASE=testdb MARIADB_USERNAME=user mocha --ignore 'node_modules/**/*' --timeout 480000 --recursive --extension .test.js .
scripts.test-mariadb-redis-cache: NODE_ENV=testing CACHE=redis STORAGE=mariadb MARIADB_HOST=localhost MARIADB_PORT=3306 MARIADB_PASSWORD=password MARIADB_DATABASE=testdb MARIADB_USERNAME=user mocha --ignore 'node_modules/**/*' --timeout 480000 --recursive --extension .test.js .
scripts.test-mysql: NODE_ENV=testing LOG_LEVEL=error STORAGE=mysql MYSQL_HOST=localhost MYSQL_PORT=3306 MYSQL_PASSWORD=password MYSQL_DATABASE=testdb MYSQL_USERNAME=user mocha --ignore 'node_modules/**/*' --timeout 480000 --recursive --extension .test.js .
scripts.test-mysql-node-cache: NODE_ENV=testing CACHE=node STORAGE=mysql MYSQL_HOST=localhost MYSQL_PORT=3306 MYSQL_PASSWORD=password MYSQL_DATABASE=testdb MYSQL_USERNAME=user mocha --ignore 'node_modules/**/*' --timeout 480000 --recursive --extension .test.js .
scripts.test-mysql-redis-cache: NODE_ENV=testing CACHE=redis STORAGE=mysql MYSQL_HOST=localhost MYSQL_PORT=3306 MYSQL_PASSWORD=password MYSQL_DATABASE=testdb MYSQL_USERNAME=user mocha --ignore 'node_modules/**/*' --timeout 480000 --recursive --extension .test.js .
scripts.test-db2: NODE_ENV=testing LOG_LEVEL=error STORAGE=db2 DB2_HOST=localhost DB2_DATABASE=testdb DB2_USERNAME=db2inst1 DB2_PASSWORD=password DB2_PORT=50000 mocha --ignore 'node_modules/**/*' --timeout 480000 --recursive --extension .test.js .

scripts.test-mssql: NODE_ENV=testing LOG_LEVEL=error STORAGE=mssql MSSQL_HOST=localhost MSSQL_DATABASE=tempdb MSSQL_USERNAME=sa MSSQL_PASSWORD=yourStrong\(\!\)Password MSSQL_PORT=1433 mocha --ignore 'node_modules/**/*' --timeout 480000 --recursive --extension .test.js .
